income_messages:
From: t*******5@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-05-03 20:12:22
SUBJECT:   Dear Sir,
  Dear Sir,
I was once the president of an oil firm but now retired. I am in asylum because of political oppression of false allegations leveled against me by some nefarious politicians in my country. I want to go private to invest US58M through a neutral individual. Let me hear from you to forward details.
Best regards,
Theodoros Ioannis   
From: t*******5@gmail.com
To: bounce+de913d.f0be45-tl1690115=gmail.com@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-03 20:12:33
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Sir,
Before I introduce myself, I wish to inform you that you should treat
this letter with confidentiality and seriousness. This letter must
come to you as a big surprise, but I believe it is only a day that
people meet and become great friends and business partners. This is a
personal email directed to you because of my present predicament. I
also apologies for using this medium to contact you for such a huge
business proposal. This is still because of the situation of things. I
was once the President/ CEO of a multinational oil company for 20
years now retired and later a public office holder for 15 years also
retired and now I am in asylum because of political oppression of
false allegation leveled against me by politicians in my country. My
Lawyer is doing the work to prove them wrong.
I want to go neutral and I want to invest $58M in your Country through
a neutral individual like you and I will move this fund to you if you
agree to work with me honestly and truthfully.
All I want you to do when the funds are transferred to you is to
establish a Lucrative Business Venture based on your advice and invest
all of the fund on the terms and condition that maybe agreed by both
parties involve at the end of every year both of us will share the
profit . Alternatively, you can come up with your investment plans. If
you are ready we shall sign a memorandum of understanding agreement
between both of us.
I wait for your prompt response ASAP through my private email address:
tl1690115@gmail.com
Regards.
Theodoros Loannis
--

outbound_messages:
From: ge28048@l******s.email
To: t*******5@gmail.com
Time: 2023-05-03 20:12:28
SUBJECT: Re:   Dear Sir,
Dear Theodoros Ioannis,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I am sorry to hear about the political oppression you have faced in your country. I am interested in learning more about your investment opportunity. Can you please provide me with more details about the investment and how it would work? Also, can you provide me with some references or past successful investments you have made? 
Thank you and best regards.
Best wishes,
Toni
From: bounce+de913d.f0be45-tl1690115=gmail.com@l******s.email
To: t*******5@gmail.com
Time: 2023-05-03 21:12:17
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Theodoros Loannis,
Thank you for reaching out to me with your business proposal. I am intrigued by your offer and would like to know more about the investment opportunity you are proposing. Can you provide me with more details about the funds you are looking to invest and the type of business venture you have in mind? 
Also, I would like to know more about your background and the situation you are currently facing. Can you provide me with more information about the false allegations that have been leveled against you and the steps you are taking to clear your name? 
Looking forward to hearing back from you.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Toni
